In contractual situations, a quality plan may need to be submitted to the customer by the organization for review and acceptance, either as part of a pre-contract consultation process or after a contract has been awarded. Once a contract is awarded, the quality plan should be reviewed and, where appropriate, revised to reflect any changes in requirements that may have occurred as a result of the pre-contract consultation.
